UBI percentage: Set the desired percentage of $UBI to be burned on top of the total price. This will favor the token ($UBI) by increasing its price.
When you click on &apos;Hire service&apo: When you click on 'Hire service', your payment will be held and it will be released to the seller when you get the service.
